00137    // inline method definitions 
00138   
00139    /*
00140    * Return the index of the bin for a value.
00141    */
00142    inline int Distribution::binIndex(double value) 
00143    { return int( (value - min_)/binWidth_ ); }
00144   
00145    /*
00146    * Get minimum value in range of histogram.
00147    */
00148    inline double Distribution::min() const
00149    {  return min_; }
00150   
00151    /*
00152    * Get maximum value in range of histogram.
00153    */
00154    inline double Distribution::max() const
00155    {  return max_; }
00156  
00157    /*
00158    * Get binWidth, the width of each bin.
00159    */

00161    {  return binWidth_; }
00162   
00163    /*
00164    * Get the number of bins
00165    */

00167    {  return nBin_; }

00171    */

00174    {
